source.name: Child Passenger Safety (CPS) Ease of Use Ratings
source.description: To assist consumers purchasing child safety seats, NHTSA has rated car seats which meet Federal Safety Standards and strict crash performance standards. While all rates seats are safe, they do differ in their ease of use in the following four basic categories: n1. Evaluation of Instructions n2. Evaluation of Labels n3. Vehicle Installation Features n4. Securing the Child n
